about_the_game:
Ahoy matey’s! Smuggler’s Fortune is a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Batten down the hatches and heave ho! From the deepest depth of Davy Jones’ locker, shiver me timbers the Dead Smuggler has surfaced!



The Smuggler’s Fortune DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so you can pillage and plunder against all those landlubbers.

Dead men tell no tales at Sker Island and the Dead Smuggler is no exception! Did he walk the plank or was just a son of a biscuit eater? Take stock of your loot and pieces of eight while you keep things shipshape with Sker Island Cove as your background. Become a revered and feared buccaneer cheering Yo Ho Ho as you go. Hoist the colours and set sail to scourge the seven seas, displaying your Smuggler Emblem.

Savvy?



This pack includes 4 new items:

Dead Smuggler Mask


An Exclusive Premium Mask of the Dead Smuggler from the depths of Davey Jones’ locker

Sker Island Cove


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Sker Island Cove

Yo Ho Ho


An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to jeer with your crewmates

Smuggler Emblem


An Exclusive Smuggler Emblem Player Icon to show your allegiance to your crew

name: Sker Ritual - Smuggler's Fortune

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Batten down the hatches and heave ho! From the deepest depth of Davy Jones’ locker, shiver me timbers the Dead Smuggler has surfaced featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
